name: Tower Defense Project
description:
Alpha Version 0.2.1

Defend your base from hoards of spiders, with various defenses. 

Game Controls

WASD - Camera navigation.

Q & E - Rotate camera left and right respectively.

Left click - Place buildings.

Esc - Pause/Resume Game.

Game UI

Buttons:

  • Toggle Shop - toggles the shop UI on and off.
  • Level 1 & Level 2 - select the level of building to buy. 

Text:

  • 1st text element - displays the player’s available money.
  • 2nd text element - displays the in-game time since level load.

Gameplay

Defense Types:

  • AOE Towers - Damages all enemies in range.
  • Single Target Towers - Damages one target at a time.

Special Buildings:

  • Distractions - This building will temporarily distract enemies and force them to run to it. The building will destroy itself after a short period of time.
